alert.note: Alert for McKean; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 3:25AM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 6 inches or more possible. Total ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch or more possible. * WHERE...Warren and McKean Counties. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix is likely from late Wednesday night through Thursday evening before changing to snow Thursday night.
info.instruction: There is the potential for significant winter weather that may impact travel. Review winter weather safety and preparedness information at weather.gov/winter. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
